title.en: Sequel Course of Finnish, Level A2 > B1
title.et: Soome keele järgkursus, tase A2 > B1

structural_units.address:
Jakobi 2, IV korrus
51005 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: A basic course on Finnish. The main emphasis is placed on teaching Finnish grammar and speaking skills.
description.et: Soome keel algajaile, põhirõhk funktsionaalsel keeleoskusel.

objectives.en: To achieve level B1 in speech and text comprehension.
objectives.et: Suulise eneseväljenduse ja teksti mõistmise tase tõstmine tasemele B1.

learning_outcomes.en: Student, who has successfully completed the course has a basic knowledge of Finnish language. He can handle everyday situations in the Finnish language, both written and spoken (language proficiency level A2). Speech and text comprehension at the end of the course could reach level B1.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukalt lõpetanu oskab soome keelt vähemalt tasemel B1
